pull.title: Set minimum supported Windows version to 1903 (May 2019 Update)
pull.body:
This PR sets the minimum supported Windows version to 1903 (May 2019 Update).

This version is the minimum [required](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/apps/design/globalizing/use-utf8-code-page#set-a-process-code-page-to-utf-8) to support the UTF-8 code page (CP_UTF8), which is necessary for https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/32380.

Additionally, the `symbol-check.py` script has been amended to verify application manifests for supported OS value.

rename.to: Set minimum supported Windows version to 1903 (May 2019 Update)

events.body: Concept ACK. We already require Windows 10, and running a version from more than 5 years ago seems a really bad idea (and unlikely, given how automatic updates work nowadays).

> ... a version from more than 5 years ago...

6 :)

comments.body: From what i could find, this tag covers every version of Windows 10 and 11, not just version 1903+. Not sure how/if you can specify a more specific minimum version.
